name: Faces of Users
author: Matt McInvale - BinaryM Inc.

sections.description:
Faces of Users gives you a shortcode to display all of your registered users Gravatars. Current options include; sizing, displaying user names and default Gravatar.

  1. Install plugin
  2. Add [facesofusers] shortcode to your content
  3. Done!

Some examples and feature requests for Faces of Users on BinaryM.com
sections.installation:
1. Upload faces-of-users.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place [facesofusers] in your text
sections.faq: None at this point. Contact me if you have any and I’ll add them here.

short_description: Display registered users Gravatars on a single page with shortcode.
